mapper.update: UPDATE Diagnosis SET diagnosisname = #{diagnosisname}, diagnosisssn = #{diagnosisssn}, diagnosismain = #{diagnosismain}, diagnosismaincode = #{diagnosismaincode}, diagnosisside01 = #{diagnosisside01}, diagnosisside01code = #{diagnosisside01code}, diagnosisside02 = #{diagnosisside02}, diagnosisside02code = #{diagnosisside02code}, diagnosissurgery = #{diagnosissurgery}, diagnosisdepartment = #{diagnosisdepartment}, diagnosisdate = #{diagnosisdate}
